Posts.Content: I have a family member that was diagnosed after a biopsy with infiltrating ductile carcinoma. She says it is very early. She told me that it was not a lump. It was more like tissue irregularity in her breast. That is all I know. Can you tell me what this means? Thank you~Jack.
Posts.Title: Ductile Carcinoma 1 2 3

Posts.Content: Hi, Suggi. Thank you for taking a minute to respond to my question. I/she/we just found out today and everyone is in shock. I just got more details. It is less than a .25 cm and is in stage one. The Radiologist saw something in the mamogram/ultrasound that no one else did. Doc says she has some decisions to make. I guess the options are massec (sp?) or lumpectomy (sp?), right? What is there to consider when deciding on one of these options? Whatever she chooses will be followed by some localized radiation. Should she be as scared to death as she is? Thanks again for your kind attention~~Jack
Posts.Title: Ductile Carcinoma 1 2 3
